history.text: Hi
Hey! Have you seen Catch Me If You Can?
Yes
is the film that you have to tlak me about?
You should rewatch it. It's so good. Did you like Leonardo DiCaprio in it?
He is a great actor, I love his performance in that film
Usually biographical true stories aren't my thing but it was so entertaining.
What did you liked the most about the film ?
I just liked all of the different cons he does. Like when he pretended to be a pilot and a doctor.
The beginning is funny too, when he pretends to be the teacher in his own class.
It has been a long time since I have seen the film, is there a reason to see it again ?
Well it has a 96% fresh score on rotten tomatoes
They are usually right, it must be a good film.  Does the film stays funny or it takes a dramatic turn ?
It gets darker in the end for sure. His cons start falling apart I think when he falls in love with the nurse in Louisiana but she refuses to run away with him.

That is quite a downer, who
 are the others actors ?
Tom Hanks is the detective who is after him and Christopher Walken is his dad.
of the detective or the conman ?
sorry, I misread you sentence

Wh
at is the role of the dad ?

What does he
 brings to the story ?
Haha it's cool. The dad's money problems are what inspire Frank to start conning people. He dies later in the movie. His death is part of the reason why Frank decides to end the chase.
Ok , it seems a good story with characters with more than one motivation. I like complexe characters
Yeah me too. It's based on a real guy so it has to be complex.
It has a satisfying ending too.
do you feel that some elements in the story were added to make it more interesting ?
Probably the dramatic details. But the overall story is true, the dude actually got away pretending to be a pilot, doctor, and lawyer. He made millions forging checks.
What did you liked about the ending ?
I like the relationship that develops between Frank and Carl (the detective played by Tom Hanks)
I like how they develop a weird friendship. And then they end up being actual friends and working together for the FBI.
How did your liked the performance of Tom Hanks ?
He's always great. His character was kind of understated in this movie, probably because they didn't want him stealing the stage from Leo.
Is there anything bad about the movie ? Everyone liked it ?
Some people didn't like how the pace slows down at the end. It feels especially slow since the beginning moves so fast.
It does not matter much to me, it think films should be more dynamic and surprising.
I think I have to re-watch this film, I was looking for a good film
have a good day

It's nice for when you want to watch 
something lighthearted but not stupid.

uid1response.feedback: The other made great arguments on why the film was good. The complex story, the great actors.
